## Decisive Point Overview {.columns-2 .smaller .build}

### Mission: 
To empower national security and defense organizations with innovative technology solutions and expert consulting services that help them achieve their mission and protect the nation.

### Vision:
To be the leading provider of innovative technology and consulting services that enable national security and defense organizations to stay ahead of evolving threats and achieve their mission with confidence.

### Lines of Effort:
- Accelerate
- Advise
- Invest
